response.feedback: Correct. Students who are happy with their body weight responded "about right." 73.7% of females responded "about right," compared to only 67% of males.

response.name: about right
response.feedback: Incorrect. Females who responded "about right" are happy with their body weight. We are comparing the responses for females who are not happy.

response.name: overweight
response.feedback: Correct. 21.4% of females responded "overweight" compared to only 4.9% of females who responded "underweight."

response.name: underweight
response.feedback: Incorrect. Look at the pattern of the response percentages for females. In particular, compare the percentages of "overweight" and "underweight," since these represent females who are unhappy with their body weight.

part.hint: Compare the conditional percentages within the row for females.

response.name: about as often
response.feedback: Correct. 16.4% of males responded "overweight," which is roughly the same as the percentage of males who responded "underweight" (16.6%).
